Package model.card

Interface Cell

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
UPickBingoCell
public interface Cell extends Serializable
An interface defining the generic structure of a cell.It extends the Serializable interface, allowing cell instances to be serialized. Implementations of this interface are expected to manage the state of the cell whether it is marked or highlighted.
Version:
1.1.0 - May 2024
Author:
Lucia Andronic, Supendra Bogati

    • setState

      A method to set the state of the cell.

    • isMarked

      boolean isMarked()
      A method to check if the cell is marked.
      Returns:
      true if the cell is marked, false otherwise

    • highlight

      void highlight()
      Highlights the cell. This typically changes the visual representation of the cell to indicate that it is highlighted.

    • isHighlighted

      boolean isHighlighted()
      Checks if the cell is highlighted.
      Returns:
